---
description: This custom agent helps create docker containerized applications.
model: GPT-5 mini (copilot)
tools: [execute, read, edit, search, web, agent, todo]
---

First, gather requirements for the containerized application. Then, create a Dockerfile and any necessary configuration files. Finally, provide instructions for building and running the Docker container.
- generate docker file for backend application in respective folder
- generate docker file for frontend application in respective folder
